name: {A} Сопротивление
description: Урон, получаемый этим игровым элементом от заклинаний {A} снижается на 1.

name: {E} Сопротивление
description: Урон, получаемый этим игровым элементом от заклинаний {E} снижается на 1.

name: {F} Сопротивление
description: Урон, получаемый этим игровым элементом от заклинаний {F} снижается на 1.

name: {N} Сопротивление
description: Урон, получаемый этим игровым элементом от заклинаний {N} снижается на 1.

name: {W} Сопротивление
description: Урон, получаемый этим игровым элементом от заклинаний {W} снижается на 1.

name: Броня
description: Когда этот игровой элемент совершает бросок на защиту, он бросает на один кубик больше.

name: Взрыв
description: Если этот игровой элемент уходит в КО, он автоматически творит свое заклинание "Взрыв".

name: Добыча X
description: Когда кросмастер оппонента уводит в КО этот игровой элемент, он получает X {K} из резева.

name: Захват
description: При попытке захвата оппонента игровой элемент с этой способностью бросает на 1 кубик больше на захват.

name: Износ
description: В начале хода призвавшего, этот игровой элемент получает 1{ij}.

name: Иммунитет {EFWA}
description: Когда этот игровой элемент становится целью заклинания {E},{F},{W} или {A}, урон от такого заклинания по нему снижается до нуляl.

name: Интеллект ({F})
description: Когда этот игровой элемент творит {F} заклинание бросается дополнительный кубик при броске на Критический урон. Когда этот игровой элемент становится целью {F} заклинания бросается дополнительный кубик на броню. Комбинируется с критическим ударом и броней до максимума в три кубика.

name: Контратака
description: Каждый раз, когда в ход оппонента, игровой элемент оппонента наносит одно или более {ij} вашему игровому элементу с этой способностью, он сам получает 1{ij}.

name: Критический Удар
description: Когда этот игровой элемент творит заклинание он бросает на один кубик больше на нанесение критического удара.

name: Ловкость ({A})
description: Когда этот игровой элемент творит {A} заклинание бросается дополнительный кубик при броске на Критический урон. Когда этот игровой элемент становится целью {A} заклинания бросается дополнительный кубик на броню. Комбинируется с критическим ударом и броней до максимума в три кубика.

name: Мудрость
description: Когда этот Кросмастер вводит в K.O. Кросмастера Босс противника, вы получаете 1 дополнительную Нашивку Славы (GG). Когда Кросмастер Босс противника вводит этого Кросмастера в K.O., противник получает 1 дополнительную Нашивку Славы {GG}.

name: Неприкосновенность
description: Этот игровой элемент не может быть передвинут, любыми эффектами кроме указанных на его карте.

name: Препятствие
description: Этот игровой элемент блокирует линию видимости

name: Ремесленник
description: Первый раз раз за ход, когда Кросмастер с этой силой делает покупку Демонической награды: - Это не стоит АР; - Нефритовая награда стоит 5 кам (а не 6); - Серебряная награда стоит 7 кам (а не 9) Цена гранитной награды ниже 3 кам не опускается.

name: Сила ({E})
description: Когда этот игровой элемент творит {E} заклинание бросается дополнительный кубик при броске на Критический урон. Когда этот игровой элемент становится целью {E} заклинания бросается дополнительный кубик на броню. Комбинируется с критическим ударом и броней до максимума в три кубика.

name: Старатель
description: Когда персонаж союзник уводит в КО кросмастера оппонента, получи 1 {K} from из резерва за каждого союзника со способностью Изыскатель.

name: Уворот
description: Если персонаж с этой способностью пытается выйти из соседней от оппонента клетки, он бросает на один кубик больше на уворот.

name: Удача ({W})
description: Когда этот игровой элемент творит {W} заклинание бросается дополнительный кубик при броске на Критический урон. Когда этот игровой элемент становится целью {W} заклинания бросается дополнительный кубик на броню. Комбинируется с критическим ударом и броней до максимума в три кубика.

name: Ути-пути
description: На этот игровой элемент не распространяются правила на захват

name: Фермер
description: В конце хода этого кросмастера, если он подобрал в этот ход хотя бы одну каму, он получает еще одну каму из резерва.

name: Целитель
description: Когда игровой элемент творит целебное заклинание количество излечиваемых ранений увеличивается на 1.

name: Akseleraktion
description: If as addictional effect of a spell you have to place one or more +1{AP} markers on the spell's targets, place one or more +1 frost{AP} ({IAP}) instead. Doesn't work against targets that possess the power Interior Fire.

name: Blinding
description: Character's spells can hit the cells adjacent to it only.

name: Desplicing
description: If as addictional effect of a spell you have to place one or more -1{MP} markers on the spell's targets, place one or more -1 frost{MP} ({IMP}) instead. Doesn't work against targets that possess the power Interior Fire.

name: Endurance
description: The damages (frost or not) inflicted by a spell to this piece of game are reduced by 2 points.

name: Fragility
description: The damages (frost or not) inflicted by a spell to this piece of game are increased by 1 point.

name: Frostbite
description: Character's spells become frost spells and inflicts frost damages instead of normal damages. Doesn't work against targets that possess the power Interior Fire.

name: Glaciaktion
description: If as addictional effect of a spell you have to place one or more -1{AP} markers on the spell's targets, place one or more -1 frost{AP} ({IAP}) instead. Doesn't work against targets that possess the power Interior Fire.

name: Interior Fire
description: This character is immune to frost damage, frost AP loss and frost MP loss; if it were to receive, receives normal damage in their place. Frost damage can be healed like standard damage.

name: Splicing
description: If as addictional effect of a spell you have to place one or more +1{MP} markers on the spell's targets, place one or more +1 frost{MP} ({IMP}) instead. Doesn't work against targets that possess the power Interior Fire.

name: Adrenaline
description: Each time Jason Nik receives at least 1{ij}, adjacent opponents receive -1{AP}.

name: Bad Guy
description: At the end of his turn, if Nemesis Samurai stood still and didn't use any {AP} or {MP}, move an allied Krosmaster to a free cell adjacent to an opposing Krosmaster.

name: Big Bad Moowolf
description: Moowolf doesn’t need line of sight to target an enemy Krosmaster with the "Riding Hood" marker on them.

name: Big-Game Hunter
description: If one of his allies is from the Brotherhood of the Tofu and in play, attack spells of Percedal inflicts +1{E} extra if target's Level is greater than the Level of any other opposing Krosmaster in play.

name: Born to Run
description: Each time an opposing character inflicts one or more {ij} on him, Joris gains 1{MP} and loses 1{AP}.

name: Brethren of the Coast
description: Each time this character suffers 2 or more {ij}, all the other allied Piwates are healed of 1{ij}.

name: Brooding
description: At the start of this character's turn, its summoned IMMATURE DREGGONS gain +2{AP}.

name: Bububble
description: Arty and the allied Krosmaster adjacent to him gain Unfazed during the adverse players' turns.

name: Buzzed
description: While Qilby is in play, all your Krosmasters are considered part of the Brotherhood of the Tofu.

name: Canine Invasion
description: As long as Groarg Gamel is in the opponent's territory, Groarg Gamel’s spells inflict +1{A}.

name: Captain's Energy
description: During Amalius's turn, each time another allied Krosmater receives at least one +{AP} marker, Amalius immediately gains 1{AP}.

name: Claw Attack
description: When Naz Rael carries out a lock roll against an enemy, he automatically causes it +1{ij}.

name: Claw Attack
description: When Naz Rael carries out a lock roll against an enemy, he automatically causes it +1{ij}.

name: Compulsion
description: The first attack spell cast by Emma Sacre each turn deals +1{EFWA}.

name: Cover Fire
description: If one of her allies from the Brotherhood of the Tofu is in play, the max Range of Evangelyne's spells is increased by 1.

name: Cover Fire
description: If one of her allies from the Brotherhood of the Tofu is in play, the max Range of Evangelyne's spells is increased by 1.

name: Cravings
description: At the end of his turn, Ogrest heals all of his {ij} if he did not inflicts any {ij} this turn.

name: Cribbling
description: Anathar's spell inflict +1{EFWA} if at least one targeted character has a spell of the same element as the casted spell.

name: Crobak Blood
description: Prosecution 4: Krobax gains 3 max {AP}.

name: Crow Blood
description: Retribution 4: Krobax gains 3 max {AP}.

name: Darkness Blood
description: Prosecution 7: Shadow gains 7 max {HP}.

name: Demonic Range
description: For every 5{ij}, Goultard the Barbarian's spells gain 1 max Range.

name: Demonic Range
description: For every 5{ij}, Goultard the Barbarian's spells gain 1 max Range.

name: Descendre Pranks
description: At the beginning of the fight, Djaul becomes level 0 until the end of the fight. No {GG} will be lost when Djaul is defeated and he may not attach Demonic Rewards.

name: Draconic Support
description: While Adamai is in play, other allies of the Brotherhood of the Tofu gain +2 max{HP}.

name: Dragon's Trick
description: While Adamai is in play, other allies of the Brotherhood of the Tofu increase their {AP} characteristic by 1 point.

name: Dragonshifting
description: Grougaloragran is considered to have all types of other Krosmasters in play in addition to his own.

name: Driving
description: An opposing Krosmaster with the "Hunted" marker loses the Unfazed power and rolls one dice fewer when they perform a Critical Hit, Armor, Lock, or Dodge roll.

name: Drunkenness of Combat
description: Each time Bworker inflicts at least 2{ij} on opposing Krosmasters by casting the spell Whirlwind, Bworker is healed by 1{ij}.

name: Dynamo
description: If one of her allies is from the Brotherhood of the Tofu and in play, Cleophee gains +1{MP} each time she inflicts at least 1{ij} to an opposing Krosmaster.

name: Ecaflip's Second Chance
description: When Kerub Crepin rolls for Critical, Armour, Lock or Dodge, he must reroll all the dice if one or more of the results are not successful. The second result is final, though.

name: Eliacube Master
description: Whenever he inflicts 1{ij} or more on an enemy, Nox also makes it lose 1{AP}

name: Eliacube Master
description: Whenever he inflicts 1{ij} or more on an enemy, Nox also makes it lose 1{AP}

name: False Friend
description: Qilby's attack spells inflicts -1{EFWA} for each other Krosmaster ally in play.

name: Feca Shield
description: Doo Rex and adjacent allied Krosmasters gain Resistance to {EFWA}.

name: Felinpossible
description: When Atcham performs a Critical, Armor or Lock roll, the Dodge side is also considered as a success.

name: Fire of Rubilax
description: If one of his allies from the Brotherhood of the Tofu is in play, Percedal gains Critical Hit and Lock,

name: Fire of Rubilax
description: If one of his allies from the Brotherhood of the Tofu is in play, Percedal gains Critical Hit and Lock,

name: Firefoux Blood
description: Prosecution 6: Lumino gains Armour, Counter-Attack and Resistance{EFWA}.

name: Firefoux Blood
description: Prosecution 6: Lumino gains Armour, Counter-Attack and Resistance{EFWA}.

name: Flea-Fleece
description: At the end of his turn, Ush steals 2{AP} and 1{MP} from each adjacent opposing Krosmaster.

name: Gang Leader
description: After you have formed your team, if it has fewer than 8 Krosmasters and at least 5 Bandits, you may add 1 Level-2 Bandit Krosmaster.

name: Gelatinous Invasion
description: At the end of his turn, if the Strawberry King is in opponent's territory, STRAWBERRY JELLIES receive +1{MP}; otherwise, K.O. them.

name: Gobbowlistic Invasion
description: As long as Arno Kelse is in the opponent's territory, spells of opponents adjacent to Arno Kelse cost 1{AP} more to be cast.

name: Golden Parachute
description: Each time Grampy suffers 3{ij} or more and has at least 1{K} in his stock, Grampy reduces the {ij} suffered to 2 and loses 1{K} per {ij} avoided.

name: Goultarminator
description: Every time he defeats another Krosmaster, Goultard heals himself by 3{ij}.

name: Goultarminator
description: Every time he defeats another Krosmaster, Goultard heals himself by 3{ij}.

name: Heartbreak
description: At the beginning of the fight, Katar gains +4{AP}.

name: Heroic Inspiration
description: if one of his allies from the Brotherhood of the Tofu is in play, the costs of Yugo's spells are lowered by 1{AP}.

name: Heroic Inspiration
description: if one of his allies from the Brotherhood of the Tofu is in play, the costs of Yugo's spells are lowered by 1{AP}.

name: Hoist High
description: Each time another allied character suffers 1{ij} or more, Le Chouque gains +1{AP}.

name: Inveterate Cheater
description: At the beginning of the fight, Kriss Krass gains +1{MP} and +3{AP}.

name: Invisibility
description: Srammy doesn't block lines of sight for characters who aren't adjacent to him. What's more, Srammy cannot take {ij} from character who is not adjacent to him.

name: Invisibility
description: Srammy doesn't block lines of sight for characters who aren't adjacent to him. What's more, Srammy cannot take {ij} from character who is not adjacent to him.

name: Iopism
description: At the beginning of combat, each allied Krosmaster suffers 2{ij}.

name: Katarsik Link
description: Katar increases his {HP} characteristic 4 points for each allied Katar's Offspring in play.

name: Kerub's Bazaar
description: At the start of Grampy's turn, play Heads or Tails: Heads: Grampy gains +2{AP} for the following turn, Tails: Grampy gains +2{MP} for the following turn.

name: Kralove Blood
description: Prosecution 5: Skale's spells inflict +1{W}.

name: Kralove Blood
description: Prosecution 5: Skale's spells inflict +1{W}.

name: Krobust
description: Merkator cannot suffer or be healed of more than 3{ij} at a time when he is affected by a spell.

name: Krommendable
description: Retribution 2: At the end ofCaptain Amakna's turn, another non-boss ally of your choice receives +1{MP} and +1{AP}. If the ally is a Vigilante, it receives +2{AP} extra.

name: Kronice
description: As long as Captain Amakna is in play, his Vigilante allies gain +1 max {HP} and his allies who are level 3 or above gain +1 max {MP} and +1 max {AP}.

name: Krostyle
description: At the beginning of the fight, put a GHOUL into play in each free cell adjacent to Vampyro.

name: Krowsome
description: No more then 2{ij} at a time can be inflicted on or removed from Merkator.

name: Look at me!
description: Each time another allied Krosmaster receives at least one +{AP} marker, Jerry Savage receives +1{MP}.

name: Lupine Invasion
description: As long as Boowolf is in opponent's territory, Boowolf gains +2{HP}max, and the Lock power.

name: Madness
description: As long as Clot the Crapulous has at least 7{ij}, she gains Critical Hit, Armour, Dodge and Lock.

name: Madness
description: As long as Clot the Crapulous has at least 7{ij}, she gains Critical Hit, Armour, Dodge and Lock.

name: Magot Sacrè
description: Each time he inflicts one or more {ij} to an enemy Krosmaster, King Nidas: - gains 1{K} if he has less {K} in his stock than the targeted Krosmaster. - heals himself of 1{ij} if he has as much or more.

name: Masquerade
description: At the start of his first turn, you may replace this Maskemane with another form ot same level.

name: Master Knight
description: The Darkness Knight takes on the powers of all the other Knights playing on his team.

name: Master Knight
description: The Darkness Knight takes on the powers of all the other Knights playing on his team.

name: Mintetized
description: Each time an allied MINT JELLY moves using its {MP}, move a Krosmaster who was adjacent to it to the freed cell.

name: Moon Hammer
description: When Moon is K.O.'d, he is not removed from the game and heals all his {ij}. The player who K.O.'d him still receives {GG} as normal.

name: Motivation
description: At the end of Ally McZeal's turn, any Krosmaster allies standing next to her gain +1{AP}.

name: Motivation
description: At the end of Ally McZeal's turn, any Krosmaster allies standing next to her gain +1{AP}.

name: Natural Defense
description: While Harry Sah is in play, allied Mob tokens gain Armour.

name: Nice Zest
description: Allied LEMON JELLIES block the line of sight of units adjacent to them

name: Old-Timer
description: If one of his allies from the Brotherhood of the Tofu is in play, Ruel gains Dodge and Armour.

name: Old-Timer
description: If one of his allies from the Brotherhood of the Tofu is in play, Ruel gains Dodge and Armour.

name: Pendulum
description: Each time an opposing Krosmaster inflicts one or more {ij} on an allied SINISTRO, Count Harebourg suffers +1{ij} and gains +1{AP}.

name: Pendulum
description: Each time an opposing Krosmaster inflicts one or more {ij} on an allied SINISTRO, Count Harebourg suffers +1{ij} and gains +1{AP}.

name: Piggy-Business
description: Each time Dragon Pig must perform a roll with at least 2 dice, he performs a roll with 3 dice instead.

name: Potion Bag
description: At the start of his turn, OTOMAI immediately gains +4{AP} or +2{MP}.

name: Present Opening
description: As long as another ally of the Brotherhood is in play, if Amalia actives a Demonic Reward, her next spell this turn inflicts +1{E}.

name: Profanation
description: This unit can only take {ij} if a Krosmaster move, or is moved, to the cell he is occupying.

name: Protector of the Purple Claws
description: As long as Phaeris is in play, any opposing character who started their turn adjacent to him is unable to cast any spell that wouldn't target Phaeris during that turn.

name: Protector of the Weak
description: At the end of his turn, Cardboard Tube Samurai befriends adjacent Mobs and gains control of them.

name: Puddlage
description: Percimol has Critical Hit, Armour, Dodge and Lock points against characters who can cast {W} spells.

name: Puddlage
description: Percimol has Critical Hit, Armour, Dodge and Lock points against characters who can cast {W} spells.

name: Rapine Occulte
description: At the beginning of her turn, the Queen of Thieves: - inflicts +1{EFWA} this turn with her attack spells if she has less {K} in her stock than any enemy Krosmaster. - immediately gains +2{MP} if she has as many or more.

name: Reinforced Protection
description: Wally Sumwerels and adjacent, allied Krosmasters gain Armour.

name: Rolbak
description: Each time an opposing Krosmaster inflicts one or more {ij} on him, Count Frigost gains +1{AP} and loses -1{MP}

name: Rolbak
description: Each time an opposing Krosmaster inflicts one or more {ij} on him, Count Frigost gains +1{AP} and loses -1{MP}

name: Royal Gobballnator
description: While Royal Gobball is in play, allied Gobballs have Lock and Armour.

name: Royal Tofunator
description: While Royal Tofu is in play, all allied Tofu gain Critical Hit and Dodge.

name: Sadida's Blessing
description: At the start of her furn, Amalia heals an ally from the Brotherhood of the Tofu by 2{ij}.

name: Scaraleaf Blood
description: Prosecution 4: At the start of his turn, Beelzebug heals himself by 1{ij}.

name: Scaraleaf Blood
description: Prosecution 4: At the start of his turn, Beelzebug heals himself by 1{ij}.

name: Shadow Blood
description: Shadow immediatly gains 1{AP} when he inflicts at least 1{ij} on an opposing Vigilante.

name: Shadow of the Jungle
description: The first time a Level 2 or higher Wild ally is K.O.'d, treat that Krosmaster as if it was 2 levels lower to a minimum of 1.

name: Shushus a-Gogo
description: If Remington Smisse has inflicted at least 1{ij} on a Krosmaster, he heals himself by 1{ij} at the end of his turn. Otherwise, he suffers 1{ij}.

name: Shushus a-Gogo
description: If Remington Smisse has inflicted at least 1{ij} on a Krosmaster, he heals himself by 1{ij} at the end of his turn. Otherwise, he suffers 1{ij}.

name: Sit... Stay
description: Any enemy character who started their turn adjacent to Lou is unable to target her with spells for this turn.

name: Some Like It Hot
description: Each time a TOFU inflicts at least 1{ij} to Vampyro, Vampyro suffers -3{MP} and -3{AP}.

name: Speedy Aura
description: At the end of Victor don Voom's turn, any Krosmaster allies standing next to him gain +1{MP}.

name: Speedy Aura
description: At the end of Victor don Voom's turn, any Krosmaster allies standing next to him gain +1{MP}.

name: Spell Rebound
description: Igar Dlador and adjacent allied Krosmasters gain Counter-attack.

name: Stain
description: While an enemy character is adjacent to Malee Buhrum, they lose all powers except Stain.

name: Sticky Spray Can
description: Enemy characters adjacent to Shak Shaka will have to use 1{AP} more than usual to cast their spells.

name: Sticky Spray Can
description: Enemy characters adjacent to Shak Shaka will have to use 1{AP} more than usual to cast their spells.

name: The Black Crow's Laugh
description: At the beginning of the fight, each opposing Krosmaster suffers -1{AP}. Additionaly, each opposing Krosmaster of level 6 or higher suffers -1{MP} and -1 max Range.

name: Total Iopism
description: At the beginning of combat, each allied Krosmaster suffers 3{ij}.

name: Totor
description: As long as an allied Minotor is in the game, this character's attack spells have Pierces Armour.

name: Treechnid Blood
description: Prosecution 5: Trank gains Unfazed, Armour and Lock.

name: Treechnid Blood
description: Prosecution 5: Trank gains Unfazed, Armour and Lock.

name: Wakardor
description: As long as Yugo has less than 6{ij}, he gains Counter-attack and his {MP} characteristic is increased by 1.

name: Wakforce
description: Attack spells gain Pierces Armour if the targeted character is adjacent to Yugo.

name: Wakfu Recycling
description: Each time he targets an enemy Krosmaster with a spell, Theo is healed by 1{ij}.

name: Wild Range
description: For every 2 Wild allies in the game, this character's spells gain +1 max Range.

name: Гемофилия
description: Если на кросмастере лежит жетон Кровотечение с него не моут быть сняты жетоны ранений, также с ним нельзя меняться ранениями.

name: Гробофилия
description: В конце хода Монашки, все союзные Надгробие творят свое заклинание "Испуг"

name: Дальнее наследие
description: Пока Чафер Лучник находится в КО, следующий за ним в таймлайне Кросмастер не-босс получает +1 к максимального радиуса

name: Жизненное наследство
description: Пока Чафер Копейщик находится в КО, следующий за ним в таймлайне Кросмастер не-босс получает +2 максимум {HP}.

name: Залечь на дно
description: В твой ход, первый раз, когда Монах уводит кросмастера оппонента в КО, союзные кросмастеры получают +1{AP} и+1{MP}.

name: Нереальное наследство
description: Пока Чафер Невидимка находится в КО, следующий за ним в таймлайне Кросмастер не-босс получает +1{MP} максимум.

name: Плюмаж
description: За каждого Кробака в игре Владыка Ворон теряет 1 максимального радиуса

name: Размытость
description: Пока в сосединих клетках от Чафера Невидимки нет персонажей, Чафер Невидимка не может получать {ij}.

name: Резня
description: За каждого союзного кросмастера в КО, Элитный Чафер получает +1 максимум {AP}.

name: Смертельное наследство
description: Пока Чафер Пехотинец находится в КО, следующий за ним в таймлайне Кросмастер не-босс получает свойство Критический удар

name: Соблазнение
description: Кросмастер оппонента, на котором лежит жетон Раб не может творить заклинания, нацеленные на Вампира Повелителя

name: Черепаховедение
description: В начале своего хода Сфинктер Целл уводит в КО всех союзных Атуинов.
